original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 15.1. Hetuduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: hetu duka kusala ttika

original: 15.1.1. Kusalapada
analyzed: kusalapada

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Hetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: hetum kusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ kusalañca
analyzed: kusalam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetum kusalañca

original: nahetuṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
analyzed: na hetum kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: tīṇi (cittasamuṭṭhānameva, ārammaṇaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: tīṇi citta samuṭṭhānam eva ārammaṇam natthi

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… nissayavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi pe nissaya vāram pi

original: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na kusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu kusalaḥ ca na hetu kusalaḥ ca dhammā na hetussa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava anantare samanantare nava sahajāte

original: nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ, indriye tīṇi,
analyzed: nissaye tīṇi upanissaye nava pacchājāte tīṇi kamme eka āhāre eka indriye tīṇi

original: jhāne ekaṁ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: jhāne eka magge tīṇi vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabba

original: 15.1.2. Akusalapada
analyzed: akusalapada

original: Hetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum akusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum akusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ akusalañca nahetuṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum akusalam ca na hetum akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… nissayavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi pe nissaya vāram pi

original: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na akusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu akusalo ca na hetu akusalo ca dhammā na hetussa na akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā eka anantare samanantare nava sahajāte

original: nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ, indriye tīṇi,
analyzed: nissaye tīṇi upanissaye nava pacchājāte tīṇi kamme eka āhāre eka indriye tīṇi

original: jhāne ekaṁ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: jhāne eka magge tīṇi vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: 15.1.3. Abyākatapada
analyzed: a byākata pada

original: Nahetuṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Nissayavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi nissaya vāram pi pe pañhā vāram pi
